<template>
  <basic-block class="cuttingblock"
    :block-width="'23%'"
    :side-color="'rgb(53,143,18)'"
  >
  <slot></slot>
  </basic-block>
</template>

<script>
export default {

}
</script>

<style scoped>

  .cuttingblock:hover .inner_block{
    transform: translateY(-5px); 
    box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
  }

  .cuttingblock:hover :v-deep(.inner_block) {
  background-color: rgb(45,82,35);
  transform: translateY(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
}

</style>
